title: ~5 champions from buying 16 chests.... and I own all of the champions
body:
That's pretty annoying. I can't get the chests for free because I was chat restricted in the past, but I've bought the bundle stuff. I bought 32 crates so far, and I got one gem, a decent amount of skins, and like ~5 champions in my last batch after already owning them all. I decided to reroll 3 for the heck of it to see what would happen, and I just got a Hecarim shard. So, that sucks.

Anyway, be careful people who have all of the champions.
